changelog:
Prepares mod for Freelancer Variations and Random ToDs integration 
- Some lighting changes
- You can no longer fall off the yacht
- NPCs should no longer be able to walk through various objects and fences
- Less things should disappear when you 'look at them the wrong way'
- Adds some food to the yacht... is meant to be a party after all
- Floor 1 toilet door only opens inwards, so that lady doesn't block it from closing any more
- Fixes various floating stuff
- Player can now walk between more couches and coffee tables
